name: Fences
description: Aluminum fences: styles, railings, privacy walls, stacking, and lifting fence. Custom fit. Japanese aluminum—corrosion resistant and maintenance-free.
descriptionLong: Sankyo-Tateyama aluminum fence systems from KunkelWorks. Multiple styles including railings, privacy walls, stacking, and lifting fence. Custom fit to your site. Same high-grade materials and quality control as carports and patio covers—resilient to humidity, rain, sea salt, and intense sunshine. Full fence styles: kunkelworks.com/fence-styles.
sizes: Custom lengths and heights; specify dimensions for quote
finishes: Anodized and coated aluminum; color options available
priceNote: Pricing by length, height, and style; email requirements for quote.
attribution: Product info from KunkelWorks (kunkelworks.com). For details and pricing: info@kunkelworks.com. Fence styles: kunkelworks.com/fence-styles.

cef-fence.name: CEF Fence (NEW)
cef-fence.description: CEF and the taller CEF-H fence series are the newest additions to the KunkelWorks product lines.
sizes: Finished Height: 23.5"/31.5"/39"/47" (taller see CEF-H or Stacking)

cefh-fence.name: CEF-H Fence (NEW)
cefh-fence.description: CEF and the taller CEF-H fence series are the newest additions to the KunkelWorks product lines.

fin.name: FIN (3 Styles)
fin.description: The FIN Fence System features decorative profiles on semi-private styles FIN-1 and FIN-2, and the solid style FIN-3, that can have a "Japanese Style Topper."
fin.colors: Black, Deep Brown, Bronze and Urban Gray

fngfv.name: FNG/FV (3 styles)
fngfv.description: The FV and FNG are the Tall & Private fences that can reach 6.5' without stacking. Both have 3 panel styles; all three totally private. FNG-3 and FV-9H have scalloped profiles and allow air flow.
fngfv.colors: Black, Deep Brown and Urban Gray

fve.name: FVE (3 styles)
fve.description: The FVE Fence System has 3 panel styles: horizontal with small gaps, vertical with small gaps, and scalloped horizontal which lets air through. Wood laminate options available.

fvx.name: FVX (13 styles)
fvx.description: 13 FVX panel styles and 6 colors; FVX-2 with vertical pickets is the most popular. Fixed panel for strength. 3 heights; can stack up to 9.6'.

ref.name: REF (2 styles)
ref.description: REPF and REOF: simple 4" pickets, very good price point. REPF has closed top rail; REOF has open pickets top and bottom. Height up to 5'. For taller fence see VOF or VPF.
ref.colors: Silver, pewter and deep brown (almost black)

sfc.name: SFC (13 styles)
sfc.description: Well priced, easy to install. 7 colors and 3 styles. Fixed panel; can stack up to 9.8'. Posts behind or between panels. No iron, no rust.

vof.name: VOF (7 styles)
vof.description: Most versatile tall fence. 5 picket options; 4 square picket styles; VOF-4 rounded, VOF-6 metal point tips, VOF-7 bent for security. Matching gates: VOMC, VPMC.
sizes: Tallest panel (no stack): 2m/6.56' all styles; VOF-1 up to 3m/9.8'

vpf.name: VPF (2 styles)
vpf.description: Tall fence solution. 2 picket spacing options, 3 colors. Commercial grade; individual picket caps and panel connectors; pickets riveted so water wicks off. Fixed and sloping panel styles. Posts behind or between. Matching gates: VPMC.

wf.name: WF (8 styles)
wf.description: Wood-look panels. 8 panel styles with wood-look options. Styles Y1, YP also available in all metal Pewter or Deep Brown. Frosted privacy inserts available. Can stack to 9.8'. Matching gates: WM (Lower & Tall).

cast-aluminum.name: Cast Aluminum
cast-aluminum.description: Cast aluminum fences and gates: solid aluminum pickets (not hollow extruded). Wrought-iron look without rust. Various heights depending on style. Matching: Cast Aluminum Gates.
sizes: Fence heights: various, depending on style

fl.name: FL (5 styles)
fl.description: Beefy FL profiles; favorite for privacy walls. Metal and wood laminate options; different picket sizes and shapes. Standard 2m (6.5') wide; 5'+ heights can order 1m panels.

bamboo.name: Bamboo (3)
bamboo.description: Artificial PVC bamboo; lasts much longer than natural. Traditional look with stainless steel wire under decorative black bindings. Horizontal panels 3-dimensional; vertical often facades.

stacking.name: Stacking
stacking.description: Japanese fence panels can be stacked to almost 10' (3 panels). Posts generally behind to show panels. Panel styles can be combined; lower panels often more see-through, upper solid for privacy.

lifting-fence.name: Lifting Fence
lifting-fence.description: Stacking posts can lift fence panels high (e.g. to use neighbor's wall). All residential fence panels can be "lifted" on stacking posts.
sizes: Lift panels on stacking posts; stack to almost 10'

fex.name: FEX (8 Styles)
fex.description: Companion line for MEX Gates. 8 panel styles: 5 semi-private, 3 fully private. Can stack for higher height. Matching gate: MEX.
